attributes.action: stop HMRC from forcing business within the mobile tele-communication industry and computer component industry to shut down due to legitimat VAT reclaims being withheld and/or rejected
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am just one of hundreds of innocent traders who have been caught up in HMRC's battle againts MTIC. We have all been branded GUILTY untill proven innocent by HMRC due to there incompetence in actually cathing the fraudsters. We all abide by HMRC's rules and regulations but this still is not enough.I feel that HMRC's tactics are to just hold everyone's vat reclaim and hope that the companies go out of business of which many are. Legal battles with HMRC are costing into the £100,000 mark of which many traders can not afford but are left with little option and this is not acceptable. SOMTHING NEEDS TO BE DONE NOW !!!!
